review: Love the fire stick. Simple and easy to use. Runs quick and has tons of apps. I mainly use it to watch sling tv, Netflix, plex and Amazon prime. A new favorite function is using this and my free Amazon cloud photo storage to run a screen saver of all our family pictures on the tv.
